additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Glucose, Fructose, Maltose, Water, Citric Acid, Potato Starch, Parfum, Citral, Limonene Linalool.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: 375g Jar of Wax, 10 Fabric Strips, Precision Spatula with Temperature Indicator, Instruction Leaflet

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Even if the jar is not too hot to hold, some of the wax may have turned into liquid and could burn if split. Always hold the jar upright when removing from the microwave and do not tilt. OVERHEATED WAX MAY CAUSE BURNS. Follow the directions for use and precautions on the leaflet inside the pack. IMPORTANT: ALWAYS REMOVE LID BEFORE HEATING THE WAX. To prevent burning: Follow the recommended heating times (timed with a watch). Take care when handling the heated jar as it may be hot.

description: Veet Warm Wax Hair Removal Kit With Wax Strips
name: Warm Wax Hair Removal Kit With Wax Strips
